転: (dez/koro) - revolve , turning around (once); suddenly, abruptly; completely (wrapped in something), quickly (unwrapping something); beautiful, round (eyes)
転々: (てんてん) - moving from place to place/being passed around repeatedly; rolling about
転かす: (こかす) - (v4s,vt)   to knock down; to knock over
転がし: (ころがし) - rolling (something)/knocking down; fishing with multiple hooks on a weighted line; repeatedly buying and selling
転がし釣: (ころがしづり) - fishing with multiple hooks on a weighted line
転がし釣り: (ころがしづり) - fishing with multiple hooks on a weighted line
転がす: (ころがす) - to roll; to turn over/to tip over/to throw down; to leave; to buy and sell (quickly for a profit)
転がり落ちる: (ころがりおちる) - to tumble down; to roll down
転がり込む: (ころがりこむ) - to roll in/to tumble into/to visit (esp. to stay overnight as an unwanted guest)/to come to live with; to fall in one's way/to fall into one's lap
転がる: (ころがる) - to roll/to tumble; to fall over/to roll over; to lie down; to be scattered about/to be common; (of a situation or outcome) to change/to turn out
転ける: (こける) - to fall over/to fall down/to fall/to collapse; to flop (e.g. of a play)/to be a flop
転げる: (ころげる) - to roll over; to tumble; to roll about (with laughter)
転げ回る: (ころげまわる) - to roll about; to writhe about
転げ落ちる: (ころげおちる) - to fall off; to tumble down
転げ込む: (ころげこむ) - to roll or tumble into
転じて: (てんじて) - by the way; meanwhile; on the other hand
転じる: (てんじる) - to turn; to shift; to alter; to distract
転す: (こかす) - (v4s,vt)   to knock down; to knock over
転ずる: (てんずる) - to turn; to shift; to alter; to distract
転てつ機: (てんてつき) - switch (of a railroad); points (of a railway)
転ばす: (ころばす) - to knock down; to topple
転ばぬ先の杖: (ころばぬさきのつえ) - prevention is better than cure; an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure; look before you leap; forewarned is forearmed; a stitch in time saves nine; have a walking stick ready before stumbling
転ぶ: (まろぶ) - to fall down; to fall over
転ぷく: (てんぷく) - capsizing/overturn/turning over/upset; overthrow (e.g. a government)
転めく: (くるめく) - to spin/to revolve/to twirl; to be dizzy/to feel faint; to bustle about

転呼: (てんこ) - sound shift (esp. in historical kana); new pronunciation
